name: @jtp0415/base-utils
description: This is a base-util repo. Import into all of projects. --JuTemp

scripts.format:slient: npx prettier src --write 2>/dev/null | sed '/prettier/d' | sed -e '/^package/d' | cut -d ' ' -f 1 | cut -d '/' -f 2 | sort | uniq | paste -s -d ' ' | sed 's/ /  /g'
scripts.build: npm run format:slient && npx vite build
scripts.build:dev: npm run format:slient && npx vite build --mode debug
scripts.build:pro: npm run format:slient && npx vite build --mode production
scripts.build:prod: npm run format:slient && npx vite build --mode production
scripts.f:s: npx prettier src --write 2>/dev/null | sed '/prettier/d' | sed -e '/^package/d' | cut -d ' ' -f 1 | cut -d '/' -f 2 | sort | uniq | paste -s -d ' ' | sed 's/ /  /g'
scripts.b: npm run format:slient && npx vite build
scripts.b:d: npm run format:slient && npx vite build --mode debug
scripts.b:p: npm run format:slient && npx vite build --mode production

author: JuTemp
